remarks: The set of expressions, which are pairs whose first element is a typecode, and whose second element is a raw expression.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mexval.k $e |- K = ( mTC ` T ) $.
mexval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mexval.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mexval $p |- E = ( K X. R ) $.
